revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Barricade column | class = BarricadeColumn | game = Strife | doomednum = 69 | convid = 273 }}[[Classes]]: BarricadeColumn
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprite is actually named BAR1A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR BarricadeColumn { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 128 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: BARC A -1 Stop } }
